ITEM.NAME: STANDALONE
ITEM.SHOW_IF: (DISTRIBUTION=='CUSTOM') OR (HIVE_SERVER == 'HIVE2' AND DISTRIB[DISTRIBUTION, HIVE_VERSION].doSupportStandaloneMode[]) OR (HIVE_SERVER == 'HIVE' AND DISTRIB[DISTRIBUTION, HIVE_VERSION].doSupportHive1Standalone[])

PARAMETER.NAME: HIVE_ADDITIONAL_JDBC
PARAMETER.SHOW_IF: (#LINK@CONNECTOR.OUT.TABLE_REF == '0') AND USE_EXISTING_CONNECTION == 'false' AND (!DISTRIB[DISTRIBUTION, HIVE_VERSION].isExecutedThroughWebHCat[] AND DISTRIB[DISTRIBUTION, HIVE_VERSION].doSupportHive2[] AND HIVE_SERVER=='HIVE2' AND DISTRIB[DISTRIBUTION, HIVE_VERSION].doSupportStandaloneMode[] AND CONNECTION_MODE=='STANDALONE')

PARAMETER.NAME: USE_KRB
PARAMETER.SHOW_IF: (#LINK@CONNECTOR.OUT.TABLE_REF == '0') AND (USE_EXISTING_CONNECTION == 'false') AND ((DISTRIBUTION=='CUSTOM') OR (DISTRIB[DISTRIBUTION, HIVE_VERSION].doSupportKerberos[] AND ((DISTRIB[DISTRIBUTION, HIVE_VERSION].doSupportHive1[] AND DISTRIB[DISTRIBUTION, HIVE_VERSION].doSupportEmbeddedMode[] AND HIVE_SERVER=='HIVE' AND CONNECTION_MODE=='EMBEDDED') OR (DISTRIB[DISTRIBUTION, HIVE_VERSION].doSupportHive2[] AND HIVE_SERVER=='HIVE2'))))

PARAMETER.NAME: HIVESERVER2_LOCAL_PRINCIPAL
PARAMETER.SHOW_IF: (#LINK@CONNECTOR.OUT.TABLE_REF == '0') AND (isShow[USE_KRB]) AND (USE_KRB=='true') AND (DISTRIB[DISTRIBUTION, HIVE_VERSION].doSupportEmbeddedMode[] AND CONNECTION_MODE=='EMBEDDED' AND HIVE_SERVER=='HIVE2')

PARAMETER.NAME: HIVESERVER2_LOCAL_KEYTAB
PARAMETER.SHOW_IF: (#LINK@CONNECTOR.OUT.TABLE_REF == '0') AND (isShow[USE_KRB]) AND (USE_KRB=='true') AND (DISTRIB[DISTRIBUTION, HIVE_VERSION].doSupportEmbeddedMode[] AND CONNECTION_MODE=='EMBEDDED' AND HIVE_SERVER=='HIVE2')

PARAMETER.NAME: JOBTRACKER_PRINCIPAL
PARAMETER.SHOW_IF: (#LINK@CONNECTOR.OUT.TABLE_REF == '0') AND (USE_EXISTING_CONNECTION == 'false') AND (USE_KRB=='true') AND ((DISTRIBUTION=='CUSTOM' AND USE_YARN=='false') OR (DISTRIBUTION!='CUSTOM' AND DISTRIB[DISTRIBUTION, HIVE_VERSION].isHadoop1[]))

PARAMETER.NAME: RESOURCEMANAGER_PRINCIPAL
PARAMETER.SHOW_IF: (#LINK@CONNECTOR.OUT.TABLE_REF == '0') AND (USE_EXISTING_CONNECTION == 'false') AND (USE_KRB=='true') AND ((DISTRIBUTION=='CUSTOM' AND USE_YARN=='true') OR (DISTRIBUTION!='CUSTOM' AND DISTRIB[DISTRIBUTION, HIVE_VERSION].isHadoop2[]))

PARAMETER.NAME: METASTORE_JDBC_URL
PARAMETER.SHOW_IF: (#LINK@CONNECTOR.OUT.TABLE_REF == '0') AND (isShow[USE_KRB]) AND (USE_KRB=='true') AND (DISTRIB[DISTRIBUTION, HIVE_VERSION].doSupportEmbeddedMode[] AND CONNECTION_MODE=='EMBEDDED')

PARAMETER.NAME: METASTORE_CLASSNAME
PARAMETER.SHOW_IF: (#LINK@CONNECTOR.OUT.TABLE_REF == '0') AND (isShow[USE_KRB]) AND (USE_KRB=='true') AND (DISTRIB[DISTRIBUTION, HIVE_VERSION].doSupportEmbeddedMode[] AND CONNECTION_MODE=='EMBEDDED')

PARAMETER.NAME: METASTORE_USERNAME
PARAMETER.SHOW_IF: (#LINK@CONNECTOR.OUT.TABLE_REF == '0') AND (isShow[USE_KRB]) AND (USE_KRB=='true') AND (DISTRIB[DISTRIBUTION, HIVE_VERSION].doSupportEmbeddedMode[] AND CONNECTION_MODE=='EMBEDDED')

PARAMETER.NAME: METASTORE_PASSWORD
PARAMETER.SHOW_IF: (#LINK@CONNECTOR.OUT.TABLE_REF == '0') AND (isShow[USE_KRB]) AND (USE_KRB=='true') AND (DISTRIB[DISTRIBUTION, HIVE_VERSION].doSupportEmbeddedMode[] AND CONNECTION_MODE=='EMBEDDED')

PARAMETER.NAME: USE_KEYTAB
PARAMETER.SHOW_IF: (#LINK@CONNECTOR.OUT.TABLE_REF == '0') AND (isShow[USE_KRB]) AND (USE_KRB=='true') AND ((DISTRIB[DISTRIBUTION, HIVE_VERSION].doSupportEmbeddedMode[] AND CONNECTION_MODE=='EMBEDDED') OR (DISTRIB[DISTRIBUTION, HIVE_VERSION].doSupportStandaloneMode[] AND DISTRIB[DISTRIBUTION, HIVE_VERSION].doSupportHive2[] AND CONNECTION_MODE=='STANDALONE' AND HIVE_SERVER=='HIVE2'))

PARAMETER.NAME: USE_SSL
PARAMETER.SHOW_IF: (#LINK@CONNECTOR.OUT.TABLE_REF == '0') AND (USE_EXISTING_CONNECTION == 'false') AND ((DISTRIBUTION=='CUSTOM' OR DISTRIB[DISTRIBUTION, HIVE_VERSION].doSupportHive2[]) AND HIVE_SERVER=='HIVE2') AND (DISTRIBUTION=='CUSTOM' OR DISTRIB[DISTRIBUTION, HIVE_VERSION].doSupportSSL[])

PARAMETER.NAME: SSL_TRUST_STORE
PARAMETER.SHOW_IF: (isShow[USE_SSL]) AND (USE_KRB=='false' OR DISTRIB[DISTRIBUTION, HIVE_VERSION].doSupportSSLwithKerberos[] OR DISTRIBUTION=='CUSTOM') AND (USE_SSL=='true')

PARAMETER.NAME: SSL_TRUST_STORE_PASSWORD
PARAMETER.SHOW_IF: (isShow[USE_SSL]) AND (USE_KRB=='false' OR DISTRIB[DISTRIBUTION, HIVE_VERSION].doSupportSSLwithKerberos[] OR DISTRIBUTION=='CUSTOM') AND (USE_SSL=='true')

PARAMETER.NAME: SET_MAPRED_JT
PARAMETER.SHOW_IF: (#LINK@CONNECTOR.OUT.TABLE_REF == '0') AND (USE_EXISTING_CONNECTION == 'false') AND ((DISTRIBUTION=='CUSTOM' AND USE_YARN=='false') OR (DISTRIBUTION!='CUSTOM' AND !DISTRIB[DISTRIBUTION, HIVE_VERSION].isExecutedThroughWebHCat[] AND DISTRIB[DISTRIBUTION, HIVE_VERSION].isHadoop1[]))

PARAMETER.NAME: SET_RESOURCE_MANAGER
PARAMETER.SHOW_IF: (#LINK@CONNECTOR.OUT.TABLE_REF == '0') AND (USE_EXISTING_CONNECTION == 'false') AND ((DISTRIBUTION=='CUSTOM' AND USE_YARN=='true') OR (DISTRIBUTION!='CUSTOM' AND !DISTRIB[DISTRIBUTION, HIVE_VERSION].isExecutedThroughWebHCat[] AND DISTRIB[DISTRIBUTION, HIVE_VERSION].isHadoop2[]))

PARAMETER.NAME: EXECUTION_ENGINE
PARAMETER.SHOW_IF: (#LINK@CONNECTOR.OUT.TABLE_REF == '0') AND (USE_EXISTING_CONNECTION == 'false') AND (DISTRIB[DISTRIBUTION, HIVE_VERSION].doSupportEmbeddedMode[] AND CONNECTION_MODE == 'EMBEDDED') AND (DISTRIBUTION == 'CUSTOM' OR (DISTRIBUTION != 'CUSTOM' AND DISTRIB[DISTRIBUTION, HIVE_VERSION].doSupportTezForHive[]))

PARAMETER.NAME: STORE_BY_HBASE
PARAMETER.SHOW_IF: (#LINK@CONNECTOR.OUT.TABLE_REF == '0') AND (USE_EXISTING_CONNECTION == 'false') AND ((CONNECTION_MODE != 'EMBEDDED' OR !DISTRIB[DISTRIBUTION, HIVE_VERSION].doSupportEmbeddedMode[]) AND DISTRIB[DISTRIBUTION, HIVE_VERSION].doSupportHBaseForHive[])

PARAMETER.NAME: REGISTER_JAR_NOTE
PARAMETER.DEFAULT: When filling in the Jar path information below, make sure that the JAR files are available on the server.

PARAMETER.NAME: NOTE
PARAMETER.DEFAULT: If you are on Windows, add a '/' in front of the path you type in.

PARAMETER.NAME: SET_MEMORY
PARAMETER.SHOW_IF: (#LINK@CONNECTOR.OUT.TABLE_REF == '0') AND (USE_EXISTING_CONNECTION == 'false') AND ((DISTRIBUTION=='CUSTOM' AND USE_YARN=='true') OR (DISTRIBUTION!='CUSTOM' AND DISTRIB[DISTRIBUTION, HIVE_VERSION].isHadoop2[]))

IMPORT.NAME: hadoop-conf-kerberos
IMPORT.REQUIRED_IF: (USE_EXISTING_CONNECTION == 'false') AND (DISTRIBUTION!='CUSTOM') AND (USE_KRB=='true') AND (DISTRIB[DISTRIBUTION, HIVE_VERSION].doSupportKerberos[] AND ((DISTRIB[DISTRIBUTION, HIVE_VERSION].doSupportHive1[] AND DISTRIB[DISTRIBUTION, HIVE_VERSION].doSupportEmbeddedMode[] AND HIVE_SERVER=='HIVE' AND CONNECTION_MODE=='EMBEDDED') OR (DISTRIB[DISTRIBUTION, HIVE_VERSION].doSupportHive2[] AND HIVE_SERVER=='HIVE2')))

IMPORT.NAME: hive-hbase-handler-0.9.0.jar
IMPORT.REQUIRED_IF: (HIVE_VERSION=='MAPR2' AND (CONNECTION_MODE != 'EMBEDDED') AND STORE_BY_HBASE=='true') and (USE_EXISTING_CONNECTION == 'false') AND DISTRIBUTION!='CUSTOM'

IMPORT.NAME: hbase-0.92.1.jar
IMPORT.REQUIRED_IF: (HIVE_VERSION=='MAPR2' AND (CONNECTION_MODE != 'EMBEDDED') AND STORE_BY_HBASE=='true') and (USE_EXISTING_CONNECTION == 'false') AND DISTRIBUTION!='CUSTOM'

IMPORT.NAME: protobuf-java-2.4.0a.jar
IMPORT.REQUIRED_IF: (HIVE_VERSION=='MAPR2' AND (CONNECTION_MODE != 'EMBEDDED') AND STORE_BY_HBASE=='true') and (USE_EXISTING_CONNECTION == 'false') AND DISTRIBUTION!='CUSTOM'

IMPORT.NAME: servlet-api-2.5-20081211.jar
IMPORT.REQUIRED_IF: (HIVE_VERSION=='MAPR2' AND (CONNECTION_MODE != 'EMBEDDED') AND STORE_BY_HBASE=='true') and (USE_EXISTING_CONNECTION == 'false') AND DISTRIBUTION!='CUSTOM'

IMPORT.NAME: guava-r09.jar
IMPORT.REQUIRED_IF: (HIVE_VERSION=='APACHE_1_0_0' OR HIVE_VERSION=='APACHE_1_0_3_EMR' AND STORE_BY_HBASE=='true') and (USE_EXISTING_CONNECTION == 'false') AND DISTRIBUTION!='CUSTOM'

IMPORT.NAME: zookeeper-3.4.3.jar
IMPORT.REQUIRED_IF: (HIVE_VERSION=='APACHE_1_0_0' OR HIVE_VERSION=='APACHE_1_0_3_EMR' AND STORE_BY_HBASE=='true') and (USE_EXISTING_CONNECTION == 'false') AND DISTRIBUTION!='CUSTOM'

IMPORT.NAME: hive-hbase-handler-0.9.0.jar
IMPORT.REQUIRED_IF: (HIVE_VERSION=='APACHE_1_0_0' OR HIVE_VERSION=='APACHE_1_0_3_EMR' AND STORE_BY_HBASE=='true') and (USE_EXISTING_CONNECTION == 'false') AND DISTRIBUTION!='CUSTOM'

IMPORT.NAME: hbase-0.92.0.jar
IMPORT.REQUIRED_IF: (HIVE_VERSION=='APACHE_1_0_0' OR HIVE_VERSION=='APACHE_1_0_3_EMR' AND STORE_BY_HBASE=='true') and (USE_EXISTING_CONNECTION == 'false') AND DISTRIBUTION!='CUSTOM'

IMPORT.NAME: protobuf-java-2.4.0a.jar
IMPORT.REQUIRED_IF: (HIVE_VERSION=='APACHE_1_0_0' OR HIVE_VERSION=='APACHE_1_0_3_EMR' AND STORE_BY_HBASE=='true') and (USE_EXISTING_CONNECTION == 'false') AND DISTRIBUTION!='CUSTOM'

IMPORT.NAME: servlet-api-2.5-20081211.jar
IMPORT.REQUIRED_IF: (HIVE_VERSION=='APACHE_1_0_0' OR HIVE_VERSION=='APACHE_1_0_3_EMR' AND STORE_BY_HBASE=='true') and (USE_EXISTING_CONNECTION == 'false') AND DISTRIBUTION!='CUSTOM'

IMPORT.NAME: parquet-hive-bundle-1.5.0
IMPORT.REQUIRED_IF: (DISTRIB[DISTRIBUTION, HIVE_VERSION].doSupportOldImportMode[] AND USE_EXISTING_CONNECTION=='false' AND DISTRIBUTION!='PIVOTAL_HD' AND DISTRIBUTION!='CUSTOM' AND HIVE_VERSION!='Cloudera_CDH4' AND HIVE_VERSION!='HDP_2_3' AND HIVE_VERSION!='MAPR2' AND HIVE_VERSION!='APACHE_1_0_0')

IMPORT.NAME: parquet-hive-bundle-1.3.2
IMPORT.REQUIRED_IF: (DISTRIB[DISTRIBUTION, HIVE_VERSION].doSupportOldImportMode[] AND USE_EXISTING_CONNECTION=='false' AND DISTRIBUTION=='PIVOTAL_HD' AND HIVE_VERSION!='PIVOTAL_HD_1_0_1')

IMPORT.NAME: snappy-java-1.0.5.jar
IMPORT.REQUIRED_IF: (DISTRIB[DISTRIBUTION, HIVE_VERSION].doSupportOldImportMode[] AND USE_EXISTING_CONNECTION=='false' AND DISTRIBUTION!='CUSTOM' AND HIVE_VERSION!='Cloudera_CDH4' AND HIVE_VERSION!='MAPR2' AND HIVE_VERSION!='APACHE_1_0_0' AND HIVE_VERSION!='PIVOTAL_HD_1_0_1')
